photo.alt: Selfie where I look sick but throwing up a peace sign and Haleigh has a beer. A cute dog is curled up at her feet.
My view from the couch. You can see my legs under a fuzzy blanket, a dog on my lap, a decked out Christmas tree and a movie on the TV.
